verses.verse: And <S%G2532><s%> when <S%G3753><s%> they came nigh <S%G1448><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> Jerusalem <S%G2419><s%>, unto <S%G1519><s%> Bethphage <S%G967><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Bethany <S%G963><s%>, at <S%G4314><s%> the mount <S%G3735><s%> of Olives <S%G1636><s%>, he sendeth forth <S%G649><s%> two <S%G1417><s%> of his <S%G846><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%>,

And <S%G2532><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%>, Go your way <S%G5217><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the village <S%G2968><s%> over against <S%G2713><s%> you <S%G5216><s%> : and <S%G2532><s%> as soon as <S%G2112><s%> ye be entered <S%G1531><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> it <S%G846><s%> , ye shall find <S%G2147><s%> a colt <S%G4454><s%> tied <S%G1210><s%> , whereon <S%G1909><s%> <S%G3739><s%> never <S%G3762><s%> man <S%G444><s%> sat <S%G2523><s%> ; loose <S%G3089><s%> him <S%G846><s%> , and bring <S%G71><s%> him .

And <S%G2532><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> any man <S%G5100><s%> say <S%G2036><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%> , Why <S%G5101><s%> do ye <S%G4160><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> ? say ye <S%G2036><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> hath <S%G2192><s%> need <S%G5532><s%> of him <S%G846><s%> ; and <S%G2532><s%> straightway <S%G2112><s%> he will send <S%G649><s%> him <S%G846><s%> hither <S%G5602><s%> .

And <S%G1161><s%> they went their way <S%G565><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> found <S%G2147><s%> the colt <S%G4454><s%> tied <S%G1210><s%> by <S%G4314><s%> the door <S%G2374><s%> without <S%G1854><s%> in <S%G1909><s%> a place where two ways met <S%G296><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> they loose <S%G3089><s%> him <S%G846><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> certain of them <S%G5100><s%> that stood <S%G2476><s%> there <S%G1563><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%>, What <S%G5101><s%> do ye <S%G4160><s%>, loosing <S%G3089><s%> the colt <S%G4454><s%>?

And <S%G1161><s%> they said <S%G2036><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%> even as <S%G2531><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> had commanded <S%G1781><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> they let <S%G863><s%> them <S%G846><s%> go <S%G863><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> they brought <S%G71><s%> the colt <S%G4454><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> cast <S%G1911><s%> their <S%G846><s%> garments <S%G2440><s%> on <S%G1911><s%> him <S%G846><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> he sat <S%G2523><s%> upon <S%G1909><s%> him <S%G846><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> spread <S%G4766><s%> their <S%G846><s%> garments <S%G2440><s%> in <S%G1519><s%> the way <S%G3598><s%>: and <S%G1161><s%> others <S%G243><s%> cut down <S%G2875><s%> branches <S%G4746><s%> off <S%G1537><s%> the trees <S%G1186><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> strawed <S%G4766><s%> them in <S%G1519><s%> the way <S%G3598><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> they that went before <S%G4254><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> they that followed <S%G190><s%>, cried <S%G2896><s%>, saying <S%G3004><s%>, Hosanna <S%G5614><s%>; Blessed <S%G2127><s%> is he that cometh <S%G2064><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the name <S%G3686><s%> of the Lord <S%G2962><s%>:

And <S%G2532><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> entered <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> Jerusalem <S%G2414><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the temple <S%G2411><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> when he had looked round about upon <S%G4017><s%> all things <S%G3956><s%>, and now <S%G2235><s%> the eventide <S%G3798><s%> <S%G5610><s%> was come <S%G5607><s%>, he went out <S%G1831><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> Bethany <S%G963><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> the twelve <S%G1427><s%>.
¶ And <S%G2532><s%> on the morrow <S%G1887><s%>, when they <S%G846><s%> were come <S%G1831><s%> from <S%G575><s%> Bethany <S%G963><s%>, he was hungry <S%G3983><s%>:

And <S%G2532><s%> seeing <S%G1492><s%> a fig tree <S%G4808><s%> afar off <S%G3113><s%> having <S%G2192><s%> leaves <S%G5444><s%>, he came <S%G2064><s%>, if <S%G1487><s%> haply <S%G686><s%> he might find <S%G2147><s%> any thing <S%G5100><s%> thereon <S%G1722><s%> <S%G846><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> when he came <S%G2064><s%> to <S%G1909><s%> it <S%G846><s%>, he found <S%G2147><s%> nothing <S%G3762><s%> but <S%G1508><s%> leaves <S%G5444><s%>; for <S%G1063><s%> the time <S%G2540><s%> of figs <S%G4810><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> yet.

¶ And <S%G2532><s%> they come <S%G2064><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> Jerusalem <S%G2414><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> went <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the temple <S%G2411><s%>, and began <S%G756><s%> to cast out <S%G1544><s%> them that sold <S%G4453><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> bought <S%G59><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the temple <S%G2411><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> overthrew <S%G2690><s%> the tables <S%G5132><s%> of the moneychangers <S%G2855><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the seats <S%G2515><s%> of them <S%G846><s%> that sold <S%G4453><s%> doves <S%G4058><s%>;

And <S%G2532><s%> would <S%G863><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> suffer <S%G863><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> any man <S%G5100><s%> should carry <S%G1308><s%> any vessel <S%G4632><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> the temple <S%G2411><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> the scribes <S%G1122><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> chief priests <S%G749><s%> heard <S%G191><s%> it, and <S%G2532><s%> sought <S%G2212><s%> how <S%G4459><s%> they might destroy <S%G622><s%> him <S%G846><s%>: for <S%G1063><s%> they feared <S%G5399><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, because <S%G3754><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the people <S%G3793><s%> was astonished <S%G1605><s%> at <S%G1909><s%> his <S%G846><s%> doctrine <S%G1322><s%>.
And <S%G2532><s%> when <S%G3753><s%> even <S%G3796><s%> was come <S%G1096><s%>, he went <S%G1607><s%> out of <S%G1854><s%> the city <S%G4172><s%>.
¶ And <S%G2532><s%> in the morning <S%G4404><s%>, as they passed by <S%G3899><s%>, they saw <S%G1492><s%> the fig tree <S%G4808><s%> dried up <S%G3583><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> the roots <S%G4491><s%>.

Therefore <S%G1223><s%> <S%G5124><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%> , What <S%G3745><s%> things <S%G3956><s%> soever <S%G302><s%> ye desire <S%G154><s%> , when ye pray <S%G4336><s%> , believe <S%G4100><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> ye receive <S%G2983><s%> them , and <S%G2532><s%> ye <S%G5213><s%> shall have <S%G2071><s%> them .

¶ And <S%G2532><s%> they come <S%G2064><s%> again <S%G3825><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> Jerusalem <S%G2414><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> as he <S%G846><s%> was walking <S%G4043><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the temple <S%G2411><s%>, there come <S%G2064><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> him <S%G846><s%> the chief priests <S%G749><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the scribes <S%G1122><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the elders <S%G4245><s%>,

The baptism <S%G908><s%> of John <S%G2491><s%> , was <S%G2258><s%> it from <S%G1537><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%> , or <S%G2228><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> men <S%G444><s%> ? answer <S%G611><s%> me <S%G3427><s%> .

And <S%G2532><s%> they reasoned <S%G3049><s%> with <S%G4314><s%> themselves <S%G1438><s%>, saying <S%G3004><s%>, If <S%G1437><s%> we shall say <S%G2036><s%>, From <S%G1537><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%>; he will say <S%G2046><s%>, Why <S%G1302><s%> then <S%G3767><s%> did ye <S%G4100><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> believe <S%G4100><s%> him <S%G846><s%>?
